node.text:
Each suite in this luxuriously refurbished historical castle-turned-hotel is named after a royal princess of the Travancore kingdom and dedicated to Indian goddesses. To make your stay fit for royalty, all suites come with a personal butler as well!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
